reviews.review_msg: Amazing professor. Very knowledgeable and passionate. Would take him again. His essays and quizzes are fair, and the students who have posted saying they are not did not study enough. I took a 400 level class with him, and was pleasantly surprised with his teaching skills versus other professors. He truly cares about what he teaches.

Seems like a nice funny guy, but he must have a personal vendetta against me. I felt I was cheated out of a better grade. Only a pro-Christian would enjoy this course centred on Jesus. Lots of Christian terminology to understand. Too many readings. Be prepared to work for a decent grade. Classmates made the course at least tolerable. Stay far away.
